page.title: 03School Staff
page.content: There are twenty_nine staff in our school.Mr Stinchcombe is the head teacher,Mrs Golding is the deputy head .There are nine full time teachers, four part-time teachers,four dinner ladies,three gardeners,three cooks and five cleaners.Mrs Howe-Double has been here the longest time_twenty six years .She is retiring this July.Mrs Osmand has been here the shortest time_seven months,while Mrs Taylor left to have her baby.She is coming back this July. The remedial teacher comes two mornings a week.The gardeners work here on Tuesday.The teachers take all subjects except music.Mrs Golding,Mrs Howe-Double and Mrs Porton teach that. Mr Bell takes 2nd,3rd and 4th year boys games.The teachers all have favourite subjects:2 like topic,2 english,2 maths,1 history,1 enviromental study and 1 music.
